comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content:
caption reads: 
Reliance V worlds champion....(unreadable)
built by smith ryan co, Algonac, Mich
photo taken nov 27th, in a 40 mile gale

Date stamp is Feb 14, 1912

otherwise know as baby reliance v, she was a "hydroplane" racer, this being the smallest one, as the racers were placed in classes depending on their length, she raced several years for Commodore J S Blackton

comment.author: 35122993@N08
comment._content: Nudecowboy: thanks for alerting us to the fuller caption information. We've taken a second look ourselves and think the unreadable text reads: hydroplan[e].   We'll update our source data to include the fuller title,  fix the date,  then reload the description.
